verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has cut <S%H3772><s%> off the nations, <S%H1471><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> land <S%H776><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, and you succeed <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their cities, <S%H5892><s%> and in their houses; <S%H1004><s%>

You shall separate <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for you in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

You shall prepare <S%H3559><s%> you a way, <S%H1870><s%> and divide the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you to inherit, <S%H5157><s%> into three <S%H8027><s%> parts, that every <S%H3605><s%> slayer <S%H7523><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> is the case <S%H1697><s%> of the slayer, <S%H7523><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall flee <S%H5127><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> that he may live: <S%H2425><s%> Whoever <S%H834><s%> kills <S%H5221><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> ignorantly, <S%H1097><s%> <S%H1847><s%> whom he hated <S%H8130><s%> not in time <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%> past; <S%H8032><s%>

As when <S%H834><s%> a man goes <S%H935><s%> into the wood <S%H3293><s%> with his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> to hew <S%H2404><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and his hand <S%H3027><s%> fetches <S%H5080><s%> a stroke with the ax <S%H1631><s%> to cut <S%H3772><s%> down the tree, <S%H6086><s%> and the head <S%H1270><s%> slips <S%H5394><s%> from the helve, <S%H6086><s%> and lights <S%H4672><s%> on his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> that he die; <S%H4191><s%> he shall flee <S%H5127><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of those <S%H428><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and live: <S%H2425><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> the slayer, <S%H7523><s%> while <S%H3588><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> is hot, <S%H3179><s%> and overtake <S%H5381><s%> him, because <S%H3588><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> is long, <S%H7235><s%> and slay <S%H5221><s%> him; whereas he was not worthy of death, <S%H4194><s%> inasmuch <S%H3588><s%> as he hated <S%H8130><s%> him not in time <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%> past. <S%H8032><s%>
Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> You shall separate <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for you.

And if <S%H518><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> enlarge <S%H7337><s%> your coast, <S%H1366><s%> as he has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> you all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he promised <S%H1696><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to your fathers; <S%H1><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H2063><s%> commandments <S%H4687><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and to walk <S%H3212><s%> ever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> in his ways; <S%H1870><s%> then shall you add <S%H3254><s%> three cities <S%H5892><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> for you, beside <S%H5921><s%> these three: <S%H7969><s%>

That innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> be not shed <S%H8210><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and so blood <S%H1818><s%> be on you.

But if <S%H3588><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and lie <S%H693><s%> in wait <S%H693><s%> for him, and rise <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> him, and smite <S%H5221><s%> him mortally <S%H5315><s%> that he die, <S%H4191><s%> and flees <S%H5127><s%> into <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H411><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%>

Then the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> and fetch <S%H3947><s%> him there, <S%H8033><s%> and deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> that he may die. <S%H4191><s%>

Your eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%> him, but you shall put <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> the guilt of innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that it may go well <S%H2895><s%> with you.

You shall not remove <S%H5253><s%> your neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> landmark, <S%H1366><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they of old <S%H7223><s%> time have set <S%H1379><s%> in your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

One <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not rise <S%H6965><s%> up against a man <S%H376><s%> for any <S%H3605><s%> iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> or for any <S%H3605><s%> sin, <S%H2403><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%> that he sins: <S%H2398><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> or at <S%H5921><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> shall the matter <S%H1697><s%> be established. <S%H6965><s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> a false <S%H2555><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> rise <S%H6965><s%> up against any man <S%H376><s%> to testify <S%H6030><s%> against him that which is wrong; <S%H5627><s%>

Then both <S%H8147><s%> the men, <S%H582><s%> between whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H1992><s%> the controversy <S%H7379><s%> is, shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the judges, <S%H8199><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall be in those <S%H1992><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%>

And the judges <S%H8199><s%> shall make diligent <S%H3190><s%> inquisition: <S%H1875><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the witness <S%H5707><s%> be a false <S%H8267><s%> witness, <S%H5707><s%> and has testified <S%H6030><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> against his brother; <S%H251><s%>

Then shall you do <S%H6213><s%> to him, as he had thought <S%H2161><s%> to have done <S%H6213><s%> to his brother: <S%H251><s%> so shall you put <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you.

And those which remain <S%H7604><s%> shall hear, <S%H8085><s%> and fear, <S%H3372><s%> and shall from now on <S%H3254><s%> commit <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> any <S%H1697><s%> such evil <S%H7451><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you.

And your eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity; <S%H2347><s%> but life <S%H5315><s%> shall go for life, <S%H5315><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> for eye, <S%H5869><s%> tooth <S%H8127><s%> for tooth, <S%H8127><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> for hand, <S%H3027><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%> for foot. <S%H7272><s%>
